definition: perform a movement in military or naval tactics in order to secure an advantage in attack or defense

participants.reasoning: The 'Somebody' in the verb frame is the agent who initiates and controls the movement.

The 'PP' (prepositional phrase) typically specifies the spatial context, direction, or destination of the movement.
